docs.text:
Changelog


Last Changes


v0.11.0






#8
: resources: added method 
wereAllReplaced
 to find out if all registered resources have been replaced
  NEW FEATURE: see ticket for details






#10
: errors: implemented publisher for the didEncounterError event
  NEW FEATURE: see ticket for details






#7
: resources: fixed null-pointer when handling 
isOptional




#6
: i18n: fixed localize to not use fallback for non-i18n values.


#9
: jshintrc: disabled enforcement of dot notation for object property access.


#5
: Fixed jshint violation




v0.10.0




#4
: Allowed to keep receiving updates from 
whenAllWereReplaced
 after initial replacement (set watch option to true).


#2
: Gracefully handle optional resources, fixed resource spec tests.


#3
: 
patches.create
: exclude properties starting with 
$$
.


#1
: Update Bower from ~1.2.8 to ~1.3.3.
docs.title: Changelog

docs.text:
#8 : resources: added method  wereAllReplaced  to find out if all registered resources have been replaced
  NEW FEATURE: see ticket for details    #10 : errors: implemented publisher for the didEncounterError event
  NEW FEATURE: see ticket for details    #7 : resources: fixed null-pointer when handling  isOptional   #6 : i18n: fixed localize to not use fallback for non-i18n values.  #9 : jshintrc: disabled enforcement of dot notation for object property access.  #5 : Fixed jshint violation
docs.title: v0.11.0

docs.text: #4 : Allowed to keep receiving updates from  whenAllWereReplaced  after initial replacement (set watch option to true).  #2 : Gracefully handle optional resources, fixed resource spec tests.  #3 :  patches.create : exclude properties starting with  $$ .  #1 : Update Bower from ~1.2.8 to ~1.3.3.
docs.title: v0.10.0
